title: Cool and hip NY Style Studio / ALL Utilities Included! Pet Friendly!
posting_body: ['357 S. Alvarado St.', 'Los Angeles 90057', 'Alex', 'show contact info', 'We invite you to live in this beautiful historic building in the heart of Los Angeles!', 'We have absolutely beautiful STUDIOS apartments, available now, STARTING AT $1,525.00 per month with a one year lease.', 'All Utilities are included except internet & cable!!', 'Walking distance from everything!!', 'Near LACC, Southwestern University, grocery stores, night life, L.A. Live, Staples Center and much more!!', 'Great for those who love the city life and appreciate New York style apartments.', 'This location is a walkers paradise which means most daily errands do not require a car.', 'The closest transit routes are the Maryland/ Alvarado 200 Metro Line and the Alvarado/ Wilshire Metro station.', 'Most units include full bathrooms, exposed brick walls, closets & hardwood floors.', 'The apartments are unfurnished.', 'ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED!!', 'The building has an elevator, on site laundry and intercom access.', 'There is no parking but there are several public garages that offer monthly services nearby.', 'To apply, the first application is $25, any additional will be $15 each.', 'Copies of ID’s per applicant and 2 recent paystubs per applicant are needed.', 'To be approved, applicants must make at least 2X rent every month, have absolutely no history of evictions and must have a credit score of at least 600.', 'Co-signers welcome.', '357 S. Alvarado St.', 'Los Angeles 90057', 'Alex', 'show contact info']
